original_title: Jeff Bezos' mother dies from Lewy body dementia: What to know about condition | Fox News
article_summary: Exercise may reduce dementia risk, according to a new study. Jacklyn Gise Bezos, mother of Amazon founder Jeff Bezos, died last week after battling Lewy body dementia (LBD), a complex and challenging progressive brain disorder affecting thinking, movement, behavior, and mood. LBD symptoms can include cognitive changes, sleep issues, and physical symptoms like slowness and tremors. The condition mostly affects people over 50, with men slightly more affected than women.</s>
